IXO RAC242 Honda Civic Ferio 1994 JTCC Series 29th Place T. Hara





The 1994 Japanese Touring Car Championship season was the first to be run under Super Touring (or Class 2) regulations. The Nissan Skyline GT-Râ€™s total domination of the series caused this change from Group A to Super Touring regulations. Takahiko Haro drove this Honda Civic Ferio in the 1994 JTCC series and has the rather unfortunate honor of scoring just 1 point for the entire season. That point came from a 10th place finish in round 4, the second race at Sportsland SUGO.
